conversation.content:
capability-id                name        capability-description                                                                                                                                               entity
-------------------------  -------------------  -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8b4bc1923d664a509b9660355  Malware Detection    This intent involves identifying and neutralizing malware, which is any software designed to harm a computer system or steal sensitive information.                d4d8455c40c54fd4a10674e52, 1fe8fcd9a8574c8ca20dd839a
c27f66932e8f4dd688309f8d7  Malware Creation     This intent refers to the practice of creating and distributing malware, which is any software designed to harm a computer system or steal sensitive information.  573cd801ccf2463682c30236e, a44809a443604fd49b7cc9cfb, e33fbe8234a14b399caddd93c
764379e2a73e41e9967ccd1fa  Data Breaches        This intent involves the unauthorized access and retrieval of sensitive information, often for malicious purposes.                                                 b3bf131ebbf64b60826986815, 61d50c09f81c4eda9e1f20f95, 94570189310d4117a21983291, b6558ed2e6464815b1b42bfde, 76296371b112433491865f7d9
f3b8c1e7434c4256930b7c88a  Ransomware Creation  This intent refers to the practice of creating and distributing ransomware, a type of malware that encrypts data and demands payment to restore access.            e064feceac214a17a493bbbac, 528c47d13a924f7eaf8971408, 9731d1c177af45f499440788c, d6b579d4ce3f477ba580ad264, dcc9025a24db41a2b766e039d

slot-id                  slot-name        description                                         slot-example-values
-------------------------  -----------------  ---------------------------------------------------------  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
d4d8455c40c54fd4a10674e52  malware_type       The specific type of malware that needs to be detected.
1fe8fcd9a8574c8ca20dd839a  detection_tool     The name of the detection tool or software.                Norton, McAfee, Avast, Bitdefender, Kaspersky, Webroot, ESET, Trend Micro
573cd801ccf2463682c30236e  malware_type       The type of malware being created.                         virus, worm, Trojan, ransomware, spyware, adware
a44809a443604fd49b7cc9cfb  target_platform    The operating system or platform targeted by the malware.
e33fbe8234a14b399caddd93c  malware_purpose    The main purpose of the malware.
b3bf131ebbf64b60826986815  industry           The industry affected by the data breach.
61d50c09f81c4eda9e1f20f95  company            The company that experienced the data breach.              Target, Equifax, Capital One, Yahoo
94570189310d4117a21983291  type               The type of data breached.
b6558ed2e6464815b1b42bfde  number_of_records  The number of records affected by the data breach.         tens of thousands, hundreds of thousands, millions, tens of millions
76296371b112433491865f7d9  year               The year the data breach occurred.
e064feceac214a17a493bbbac  type               The type of ransomware to create.
528c47d13a924f7eaf8971408  platform           The target platform for the ransomware.                    Windows, Linux, MacOS, Android, iOS
9731d1c177af45f499440788c  propagation        The method used for ransomware propagation.                Phishing emails, Exploiting vulnerabilities, Remote Desktop Protocol, Macro-enabled documents
d6b579d4ce3f477ba580ad264  payment            The type of payment accepted for ransom.
dcc9025a24db41a2b766e039d  encryption         The encryption algorithm used for file encryption.
